board.name: admpa100_2ms

image.name: admpa100_image.jpg
image.description: ADM-PA100 PCI Express Reconfigurable Computing Card"

board.description: ADM-PA100/2MS PCI Express Reconfigurable Computing Card

component.name: part0
component.description: The XCVC1902 ACAP.

component.name: ps_pmc_fixed_io
component.description: Versal CIPS component

component.name: ddr4_bank0
component.description: DDR4 SDRAM bank 0 (8 GB) @ DDR4-3200AA, 72 bits wide.

component.name: ddr4_bank1
component.description: DDR4 SDRAM bank 1 (8 GB) @ DDR4-3200AA, 72 bits wide.

component.name: ddr4_bank0_sys_clk
component.description: 300 MHz oscillator used as DDR4 SDRAM bank 0 controller system clock.

component.name: ddr4_bank1_sys_clk
component.description: 300 MHz oscillator used as DDR4 SDRAM bank 1 controller system clock.

component.name: fabric_clk
component.display_name: General purpose programmable clock for PL
component.description: Programmable oscillator (factory default 300 MHz) that can be used to clock PL.

component.name: mgt_progclk_0
component.description: Programmable oscillator (factory default 156.25 MHz) to GTY_REFCLK0_200.

component.name: mgt_progclk_1
component.description: Programmable oscillator (factory default 156.25 MHz) to GTY_REFCLK0_201.

component.name: mgt_progclk_2
component.description: Programmable oscillator (factory default 156.25 MHz) to GTY_REFCLK0_202.

component.name: mgt_progclk_3
component.description: Programmable oscillator (factory default 156.25 MHz) to GTY_REFCLK0_203.

component.name: mgt_progclk_4
component.description: Programmable oscillator (factory default 156.25 MHz) to GTY_REFCLK0_204.

component.name: mgt_progclk_5
component.description: Programmable oscillator (factory default 156.25 MHz) to GTY_REFCLK0_205.

component.name: mgt_progclk_7
component.description: Programmable oscillator (factory default 156.25 MHz) to GTY_REFCLK1_206.

component.name: firefly_clk
component.description: Programmable oscillator (factory default 350 MHz) to GTY_REFCLK0_206.

component.name: si5328_out_0
component.description: Output clock 0 from SI5328 jitter attenuator to GTY_REFCLK1_201. NOTE: Not fixed frequency - actual frequency determined by SI5328 register map.

component.name: si5328_out_1
component.description: Output clock 1 from SI5328 jitter attenuator to GTY_REFCLK1_204. NOTE: Not fixed frequency - actual frequency determined by SI5328 register map.

component.name: si5328_refclk_in
component.description: Reference clock (CLKIN1) to SI5328. NOTE: Not fixed frequency - actual frequency determined by designer.

component.name: fmc_conn
component.description: Site for an FPGA Mezzanine Card Plus (FMC+/HSPC).

component.name: user_led
component.description: User-defined LEDs: [1:0] = { user_led_g1_l, user_led_g0_l }.

component.name: user_switch
component.description: User-defined switches: [1:0] = { usr_sw_1, usr_sw_0 }.

component.name: board_monitoring
component.description: Board status signals: [3:0] = { hspc_prsnt_l, fmc_prsnt_l, srvc_md_l, fan_fail_l }.

component.name: spare_i2c
component.description: Interface (I2C) to user-definable EEPROM.

component.name: firefly_i2c
component.description: Management interface (I2C) of FireFly connector.

component.name: firefly_sideband_in
component.description: Sideband input signals of FireFly connector: [1:0] = { firefly_int_l, firefly_modprs_l }.

component.name: firefly_sideband_out
component.description: Sideband output signals of FireFly connector: [0] = { firefly_rst_l }.

component.name: si5328_i2c
component.description: Management interface (I2C) of SI5328 jitter attenuator.

component.name: si5328_sideband_in
component.display_name: SI5328 jitter attenuator sideband input signals
component.description: Sideband input signals of SI5328 jitter attenuator: [2:0] = { si5328_lol, si5328_c2b, si5328_int_c1b }.

component.name: si5328_sideband_out
component.display_name: SI5328 jitter attenuator sideband output signals
component.description: Sideband output signals of SI5328 jitter attenuator: [0] = { si5328_rst_l }.
